quotes.quote: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Our DNA is as a consumer company - for that individual customer who's voting thumbs up or thumbs down. That's who we think about. And we think that our job is to take responsibility for the complete user experience. And if it's not up to par, it's our fault, plain and simply.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote:
We don’t get a chance to do that many things, and every one should 
be really excellent. Because this is our life. Life is brief, and then 
you die, you know? And we’ve all chosen to do this with our lives. So it
 better be damn good. It better be worth it.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote:
That’s been one of my mantras — focus and simplicity. Simple can be 
harder than complex; you have to work hard to get your thinking clean to
 make it simple..
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Quality is much better than quantity. One home run is much better than two doubles.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote:
Sometimes when you innovate, you make mistakes. It is best to admit 
them quickly, and get on with improving your other innovations.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote:
You can’t connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect 
them looking backward. So you have to trust that the dots will somehow 
connect in your future. You have to trust in something — your gut, 
destiny, life, karma, whatever. This approach has never let me down, and
 it has made all the difference in my life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote:
Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to 
avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose. You are already 
naked. There is no reason not to follow your heart.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote:
Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only 
way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And 
the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven’t 
found it yet, keep looking. Don’t settle. As with all matters of the 
heart, you’ll know when you find it. And, like any great relationship, 
it just gets better and better as the years roll on. So keep looking 
until you find it. Don’t settle.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs
